alert.note: Alert for Orange; Riverside (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 03 at 2:48PM PDT until September 03 at 3:30PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Diego has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Riverside County in southern California... Eastern Orange County in southwestern California... * Until 330 PM PDT. * At 248 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Temescal Valley, or near Lake Elsinore, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southern Corona, western Lake Elsinore, Perris, Temescal Valley and Lake Mathews. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
